short_summary: Collins Bay Institution Shower Drain Retrofit - Phase 2 ITT
tags: Faucet and shower heads, jets and parts and accessories
full_summary:
**Collins Bay Institution Shower Drain Retrofit - Phase 2 Tender Announcement**
===========================================================================

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

*   Solicitation Number: WS4363736850
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Publication Date: January 30, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2024, 14:00 EST
*   Amendment Date: February 20, 2024

**Project Description**
------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Real Property Branch is issuing a tender for the second phase of a two-phase process to retrofit the shower drains at the Collins Bay Institution maximum security facility. The project involves carrying out repairs and retrofitting work on the inmate living quarters' shower drains.

**Bid Requirements**
----------------------

Qualified suppliers who have completed the first phase of the process are invited to submit a bid for the project. The bid must include all required supporting documentation and must be submitted by 14:00 EST on the tender closing date.

**Contract Requirements**
-------------------------

The successful contractor must perform and complete the work within 60 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Tender Closures Issues**
---------------------------

All bids submitted after 14:00 EST on the tender closing date will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**
-------------------------

Carter Gooch
A/S (to) Carter Gooch
SPAC/PSPC

carter.gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Note**
---------

This tender announcement is for Phase 2 of a two-phase process. Suppliers are required to have completed the first phase to be eligible to bid on Phase 2.  

I have only included the main information in the placement.  Please don't hesitate to contact if you need a more complete version of the project. 

I Hepe that this is what you were looking for. 


Best regards, [resume]?*   Laurence Devin 


We will work to improve any errors we found. As it was an urgent mission. 

Please let me know if you have any other needs.

Best regards,

Laurence Devin
